item.title: Comparison of password managers and my setup
item.description: Introduction For a long time I was looking for a password manager which would meet all the following requirements: Open-source, CLI/TUI application must not be written in any scripting language. I don’t want slow startup time, I might use a password manager in scripts and 0.5s startup time is unacceptable. Android & Linux support, Option for self-hosting, Must be relatively easy to synchronize between multiple computers, must work on Linux and Android.
